name: Puzzlacki
overview: Puzzlacki is a classic puzzle game with 8 available pictures. The player may setup difficulty level and timer or select any of the pictures. The game screen is divided into three parts: table with mixed puzzles, timer, picture frame. Published on Magic Disk 64 1994/09. Do you enjoy solving a puzzle? Well, then Puzzlacki is definitely the right thing for you! After starting the program, the following options can be selected: • infinite time • Simplified game mode • background music You also have to choose one of the numerous puzzle pictures: This is done with the joystick in port # 2. Then get down to business. You can activate a puzzle piece with the fire button and switch to the picture to be completed with SPACE. Here you can now place the selected part according to your ideas. You come back to the end of the puzzle with SPACE. If you know all the puzzles like the back of your hand after a while, you can try the expert mode or set yourself a strict time limit. The choice is yours!
